org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.reporting.freemarker

Class RenderApplicationPieChartDirective

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.reporting.freemarker.RenderApplicationPieChartDirective
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    freemarker.template.TemplateDirectiveModel, freemarker.template.TemplateModel, WindupFreeMarkerTemplateDirective

    public class RenderApplicationPieChartDirective
extends Object
implements WindupFreeMarkerTemplateDirective
    Renders a JavaScript block that calls Flot. This depends upon the template already loading the JQuery and Flot Charting Javascript files. The chart will present a distribution of packages that have been hinted by Windup.
    Author:
    jsightler
